mapper.select: SELECT * FROM the_sight_member ORDER BY f_id DESC limit #{pageNum}, 5;
SELECT count(*) as m_count FROM the_sight_member WHERE m_confirm = #{m_confirm} and (m_userid = #{m_userid} or m_email = #{m_email})
SELECT *,IFNULL(m_userid,'---') FROM the_sight_member WHERE m_userid = #{m_userid} AND m_password = #{m_password}
mapper.update: UPDATE the_sight_member SET m_used = 0, WHERE m_userid = #{m_userid}
UPDATE the_sight_member SET f_title = #{f_title}, f_content = #{f_content} WHERE f_id = #{f_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO the_sight_member(m_userid, m_email, m_name, m_gender, m_birth, m_emailcheck, m_confirm) VALUES(#{m_userid}, #{m_email}, #{m_name}, #{m_gender}, #{m_birth}, true, #{m_confirm})
mapper.select: INSERT INTO the_sight_member(m_userid, m_password, m_name, m_birth, m_gender, m_email, m_emailcheck, m_salt) VALUES(#{m_userid}, #{m_password}, #{m_name}, #{m_birth}, #{m_gender}, #{m_email},#{m_emailcheck}, #{m_salt})
